channel.title: Making d claws hit 4 times when spec
channel.description:
Hey i want to make it so when i spec with drag claws it specs 4 times so in one spec you see 4 splats for e.g u`ll see 30,30,5,5
Can somone please explain what to do or give me the code thanks
Much apprciaited
